messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Re: Gatling-----some history Prof Murf-reply
messages.msgSnippet: First use on battlefield was at Siege of Petersburg.  I doubt if it was used in the Draft Riots.  The battle of Gettysburg was almost concurrent:  why was it
messages.messageBody:
First use on battlefield was at Siege of Petersburg. I doubt if it was used
in the Draft Riots. The battle of Gettysburg was almost concurrent: why was
it not used then? Jack Murphy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
